titles.title: A resolution celebrating the 140th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the United States and Romania.
A resolution celebrating the 140th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the United States and Romania.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the 140th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the United States and Romania. The resolution applauds Romania for its economic and social progress and encourages the United States to advocate for an increased NATO (North Atlantic Treaty Organization) presence in Romania.
